Articles.Content:
ok here is how it goes...

point of the game is to say funny last words that don't always have to be related to KSP

rules:

no trolling (obviously)

Nothing inappropriate because there maybe kids here

only one last word/words per post

doesn't necessarily have to be related to the above post

Example:

That doesn't smell like popcorn?

also this is my first forum game so i yeah

Edit: to define trolling i mean as in just attacking the other posters for what they posted

Edited February 1, 2014 by Helix935

This might be trolling, and I'm not sure I really understand the game, but here it goes:

"I left... sixty pounds... of gold... under the..." *dies*
Here, watch this!

This might be trolling, and I'm not sure I really understand the game, but here it goes:

"I left... sixty pounds... of gold... under the..." *dies*

no that wasn't trolling also it just about saying something like what technicalfool just said without the *dies* part

also i might as well say something as part of this game

are you sure this is a good idea?
Hey guys, I'm going to try to flyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy *splat*
Safe? Ya, I'm being sa-...
Of all the things you could've done, you decided to go and activate the antimatter bomb? That's the stupidest thi-"
"So, not that button... That butto-"
Less parachutes is more fun, right?
wait i thought the ground was that wa-
"Ok now deploy the parachutes at 500m, you should land right at the heliport... wait the altimeter is in feet? WH-"
hmm the object appears to be getting larger the closer i get to it *looks at notepad* i'll tell you when to stop when i finish writing these note-
So long and thanks for all the - hum - Bacon... *die*
hey did you remember to close the airlock before laun-
"Wait, That's not grass, that's a creeper! AAAAAAAH-"
don't worry about the leak it should dissipa-
What's that ticking noise?...
hmm what is that moving towards u-
"That thing is probably some kind of raw sewage container. Go ahead and rub your face all over it. -- GLaDOS.

Hey, we need to slow down, we have 1 minute to collision *BOOOOM*

Jeb, can you hear me? We've made a mistake, the timer was showing the time in seconds!
Don't worry, it is perfectly safe...
wait i thought you said it was-

I'm sure there's a lot that will start with "Don't worry, ..."

"Don't worry, I know what I'm doin-"

Q: "Go left?"

A: "Right"

Q: "Right? Ok, if you s-"

I suppose that's why pros are trained to say "Affirmative."
It's getting stuffy in this space suit. I think I will take it off for a while...
